31  unsigned int get## map ##ByteCount() const; \

34  void set## map ##AllocatedByteCount(unsigned int);

41  virtual void set ## a (DepthSense::InterfaceImpl* context, type value); \
42  virtual bool b ## IsReadOnly (DepthSense::InterfaceImpl* context); \
43  virtual type get ## a (DepthSense::InterfaceImpl* context);
